Description: Brand:Ibanez Model:RGTHRG2 Year:2007 Condition:Used, But like new. Case:Hard Shell Case Color:Flat Black with Giger Graphic on Top Neck Construction:Neck-Through-Body Neck:Maple and Walnut Fingerboard:Rosewood Frets:24 Inlays:Abalone Shark Tooth Binding:Abalone Neck and Headstock Top:Giger Graphic Body/Back:Mahogany "NYC XI" Hardware:Black Pickups:Ibanez Infinity 1/2 Coil Tapping:NA Bridge:Ibanez Edge Pro Tremolo Tuners:Ibanez Selector:3 Way Blade Knobs:Volume, Tone Inventory Number:1G94331107-3479 The RGTHRG2 is an RG series solid body electric guitar model introduced by Ibanez in 2007. It is part of the H. R. Giger series with body covered in a graphic print of a portion of Giger's painting NY City XI (Exotic). The RGTHRG2 features neck-through-body construction with mahogany body wings attached to a maple and walnut neck. The neck has a 24-fret bound rosewood fingerboard with deluxe sharktooth position markers. Components include dual Ibanez Infinity humbucking pickups, an Edge Pro II double locking tremolo bridge and a locking nut. The RGTHRG2 was the second RGT model bearing a Giger graphic after 2005's RGTHRG1. The RGTHRG2 was discontinued after two years of production.
Title: Ibanez RGTHRG2 HR Giger Limted Edition Guitar (Very Rare).
